sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Lost Money on SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN)? Join Class Action Before May 27, 2025 - Contact Levi & Korsinsky
feed.summary: A class action securities lawsuit has been filed against SoundHound AI, Inc. on behalf of shareholders who suffered losses between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025, due to alleged securities fraud. The lawsuit claims that SoundHound made false statements and concealed material weaknesses in its internal controls, leading to an overstatement of goodwill after acquisitions. Levi & Korsinsky LLP is representing the aggrieved shareholders, urging those affected to join the class action before May 27, 2025.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against SoundHound AI, Inc. and Certain Officers - SOUN
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ: SOUN) and certain officers, alleging materially false and misleading statements regarding the Company's business, operations, and prospects. The lawsuit, filed on behalf of investors who purchased SoundHound securities between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025, claims the company misrepresented its ability to account for corporate acquisitions despite material weaknesses in internal controls. The suit details how SoundHound's stock price dropped following disclosures about delayed financial filings and errors in accounting related to acquisitions.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against SoundHound AI, Inc. and Certain Officers - SOUN
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against SoundHound AI, Inc. and certain officers on behalf of investors who purchased SoundHound securities between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound made materially false and misleading statements regarding its business, operations, and prospects, specifically concerning material weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting that impaired its ability to effectively account for corporate acquisitions like SYNQ3 and Amelia Holdings. These alleged misstatements led to an overstatement of goodwill and an inability to timely file financial reports.

feed.title: SoundHound AI, Inc Faces Stock Turbulence Amid Market Volatility
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) has seen an 8.12% stock price decline despite positive analyst upgrades, including a raised price target of $15 from Mizuho Securities and Cantor Fitzgerald. The company reported increased revenue but also a significant GAAP net loss, coupled with negative insider sentiment due to increased selling. The stock's performance is further impacted by broader market volatility in the AI sector, even as SoundHound pursues strategic partnerships like its integration with OpenTable for conversational in-vehicle voice AI.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Shares Dip Amid Market Volatility
feed.summary: SoundHound AI (SOUN) shares are experiencing volatility despite a promising partnership with OpenTable to integrate conversational in-vehicle voice AI reservations. The stock's decline is largely attributed to broader market pullbacks, highlighting the volatile nature of the AI sector. SoundHound AI aims to enhance its in-car voice commerce platform and strengthen relationships with automakers through this strategic move.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Integrates With OpenTable to Introduce In-Vehicle Reservations Using Voice AI
feed.summary: SoundHound AI has partnered with OpenTable to introduce a fully conversational in-vehicle voice AI reservations agent within SoundHound's in-car voice commerce platform. This integration enables drivers and passengers to find, select, and book restaurant reservations hands-free using natural voice commands in their car's infotainment system. The new feature connects to OpenTable's network of over 60,000 restaurants, allowing for real-time availability checks and seamless bookings, enhancing convenience for drivers.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against SoundHound AI, Inc. and Certain Officers – SOUN
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against SoundHound AI, Inc. and certain officers on behalf of investors who purchased SoundHound securities between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound made materially false and misleading statements concerning its internal controls over financial reporting and its ability to account for corporate acquisitions, which led to an overstatement of reported goodwill. The Class Period investors have until May 27, 2025, to apply to the Court to be appointed as Lead Plaintiff.

feed.title: SoundHound AI, Inc. - Class A Common Stock (Nasdaq:SOUN) Stock Quote
feed.summary: This article provides a stock quote and recent news for SoundHound AI, Inc. (Nasdaq:SOUN). It details current stock price, trading volume, ranges, performance metrics, and a list of recent news headlines related to the company's AI integrations and stock performance.

feed.title: ROSEN, A GLOBALLY RECOGNIZED LAW FIRM, Encourages SoundHound AI, Inc. Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action - SOUN, SOUNW
feed.summary: Rosen Law Firm is encouraging investors of SoundHound AI, Inc. to secure counsel before the May 27, 2025, lead plaintiff deadline in a securities class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound made false and misleading statements regarding material weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting, leading to inflated goodwill and an inability to timely file financial reports. Investors who purchased SoundHound securities between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025, may be entitled to compensation.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against SoundHound AI, Inc. and Certain Officers – SOUN
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against SoundHound AI, Inc. and certain officers on behalf of investors who purchased securities between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound made misleading statements regarding its business, operations, and prospects, particularly concerning material weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting and its ability to effectively account for corporate acquisitions. The complaint details how these issues led to an inability to timely file financial reports and required corrections to goodwill reported after the Amelia Acquisition, causing a drop in stock price.

feed.title: SoundHound AI, Inc. to Participate in Barclays Annual Global Technology Conference on December 11, 2025
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. announced its participation in the Barclays Annual Global Technology Conference on December 11, 2025, where CFO Nitesh Sharan will engage in a live fireside chat. Specializing in voice and conversational AI, SoundHound delivers solutions across various industries and processes billions of interactions annually. The event broadcast offers visibility for the company, but the early timing of the presentation and lack of concrete financial metrics in the summary could be seen as negatives.

feed.title: Lost Money on SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN)? Contact Levi & Korsinsky to Join Class Action Before May 27, 2025
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky LLP is inviting investors who lost money on SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOUN) between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025, to join a class action securities lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound AI, Inc. made false statements and concealed material weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting, leading to inflated goodwill and difficulties in accounting for corporate acquisitions. Shareholders are encouraged to contact the firm to learn about their rights to recover losses before the May 27, 2025 deadline.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Inc. Faces Sell-Off Amid Insider Trading Moves
feed.summary: SoundHound AI Inc.'s stock has fallen by 8.42% due to investor concern sparked by recent insider trading. The company's CTO, Timothy Stonehocker, and insider Majid Emami sold significant shares, leading to questions about future performance and skepticism among investors. Despite healthy revenue, SoundHound AI faces profitability struggles and operational challenges, with a negative profit margin and high price-to-sales ratio contributing to market volatility.

feed.title: Mizuho Securities Sticks to Their Hold Rating for SoundHound AI, Inc Class A (SOUN)
feed.summary: Mizuho Securities has maintained its Hold rating for SoundHound AI, Inc Class A (SOUN) with a price target of $15.00. Cantor Fitzgerald also issued a Hold rating, while H.C. Wainwright reiterated a Buy rating. The company reported quarterly revenue of $42.68 million and a GAAP net loss of $74.72 million, and corporate insider sentiment is negative due to increased selling activity.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Stocks Surge Amid Revenue Boom
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. Class A (SOUN) stocks have significantly surged due to an impressive Q2 earnings report showing a 217% year-over-year revenue increase. This strong performance and raised full-year guidance have led to upgraded analyst price targets, suggesting potential for continued growth. Although not yet profitable, the company's rapid revenue growth and positive market outlook make it an appealing but high-risk investment.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Executives Make Major Moves with Stock Sales!
feed.summary: SoundHound AI executives, including CEO Keyvan Mohajer, COO Michael Zagorsek, and CTO Timothy Stonehocker, have sold significant shares totaling millions of dollars on September 24, 2025. This comes as the company has recently partnered with Red Lobster to implement an AI-powered phone ordering system, contributing to a bullish sentiment despite mixed analyst opinions on profitability and market penetration. TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates SOUN as Neutral due to strong revenue growth and positive earnings call highlights, balanced against negative net profit margins and high operating expenses.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Stocks Soar Amid Strategic Moves
feed.summary: SoundHound AI's stock has surged over 150% in the past six months due to strong Q2 results and a strategic partnership with Apivia Courtage for its Amelia 7 AI platform. Despite this growth and increased adoption of its technology, analysts express cautious optimism, pointing to a potential downside based on the current price target. The company's strategic moves and AI collaborations are driving investor interest, though volatility is noted.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Faces Stock Turbulence Amid Insider Sales
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) recently experienced a 7.91% stock price decline following significant insider sales by CEO Keyvan Mohajer and COO Michael Zagorsek. These sales occurred after a period of substantial growth, raising investor concerns despite the company's strategic partnership with Red Lobster and a Moderate Buy consensus rating from analysts. The company faces competitive threats and profitability challenges, leading investors to watch for stability and growth in its AI initiatives.

feed.title: Investors in Shares of SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOUN) should Contact the Shareholders Foundation in Connection with Lawsuit
feed.summary: The Shareholders Foundation, Inc. announces a pending lawsuit for certain investors in SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOUN) shares who purchased in May 2024. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound AI, Inc. made false and misleading statements regarding material weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting, impacting its ability to account for corporate acquisitions and inflating reported goodwill. Investors are encouraged to contact the Shareholders Foundation for options regarding the lawsuit.

feed.title: SoundHound AI, Inc: A Rising Star in AI Stocks
feed.summary: SoundHound AI (SOUN) saw a 13.84% stock price increase following a strong Q2 earnings report with a 217% revenue increase year-over-year. The company raised its full-year revenue guidance and strengthened its market position with the acquisition of Interactions, an AI-powered customer service company. Analysts maintain a moderately bullish stance, citing the company's robust backlog and strategic acquisitions, despite some caution about the recent surge's pace relative to fundamentals.

feed.title: Class Action Alert: Levi & Korsinsky Reminds SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) Investors of May 27, 2025 Deadline
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky reminds investors of SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) about the May 27, 2025 lead plaintiff deadline in a class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that SoundHound made materially false or misleading statements regarding its business, operations, and prospects. Investors who purchased SOUN shares between December 1, 2023, and March 13, 2024, may be affected.

feed.title: Why SoundHound AI Shares Are Facing Turbulence
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) is experiencing stock volatility. While a partnership with Red Lobster initially boosted the stock, concerns over insider sales and competitive threats have tempered investor enthusiasm, leading to mixed analyst reactions.

feed.title: SoundHound AI (NASDAQ:SOUN) Trading Down 8.4% Following Insider Selling - MarketBeat
feed.summary: SoundHound AI (NASDAQ:SOUN) experienced an 8.4% drop in stock value following insider selling by CFO Nitesh Sharan, who sold 60,376 shares worth approximately $1.28 million. Despite this, analysts have a "Moderate Buy" rating with a $15.50 price target. The company reported significant revenue growth of 216.3% year-over-year but missed earnings expectations with a loss of $0.19 per share.

feed.title: SOUNDHOUND AI CFO Sells Over $1.2 Million in Company Stock - TradingView
feed.summary: SOUNDHOUND AI's Chief Financial Officer, Sharan Nitesh, who also holds positions as a 10% owner and director, sold 60,376 shares of Class A Common Stock for over $1.2 million on October 14, 2025. This transaction was conducted under a Rule 10b5-1 trading plan. Following the sale, Nitesh still directly owns 1,765,928 shares of the company's stock.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Named a Leader in Everest Group’s Conversational AI and AI Agents in Customer Experience Management (CXM) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025 - The Manila Times
feed.summary: SoundHound AI has been recognized as a Leader in Everest Group's Conversational AI and AI Agents in Customer Experience Management (CXM) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. The report highlights SoundHound AI's strong market presence, technology capabilities, and commitment to innovation in conversational AI. This recognition underscores the company's significant impact on improving customer experience through advanced AI solutions.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Named a Leader in Everest Group’s Conversational AI and AI Agents in Customer Experience Management (CXM) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. (Nasdaq: SOUN) has been recognized as a Leader in Everest Group's Conversational AI and AI Agents in Customer Experience Management (CXM) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. The report highlights SoundHound's agentic AI framework and proprietary voice engine (Polaris) for their ability to support complex enterprise AI use cases and deliver natural, multilingual interactions. This recognition underscores SoundHound's commitment to advancing conversational AI and its Amelia platform, which offers agentic capabilities for businesses.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Named a Leader in Everest Group’s Conversational AI and AI Agents in Customer Experience Management (CXM) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
feed.summary: SoundHound AI has been recognized as a Leader in Everest Group’s Conversational AI and AI Agents in Customer Experience Management (CXM) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. The report highlights SoundHound's proprietary agentic AI framework, which enables flexible adoption of AI agents and automates complex workflows, and its superior voice engine, Polaris, known for advanced conversational features. This recognition underscores SoundHound's role in advancing agentic automation for enterprise CXM through its Amelia platform and dedicated Supervisor AI layer.

feed.title: SoundHound: Holding For A Better Price (NASDAQ:SOUN) - Seeking Alpha
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. is highlighted as a high-risk/high-reward investment due to its disruptive Voice AI technology and significant competitive advantages in a rapidly growing market. Despite its strong growth prospects and status as the only pure play in Voice AI, the article recommends a "Hold" rating due to its current rich valuation, suggesting investors wait for a better entry price.

feed.title: Investors Flock to SoundHound AI Stock (SOUN)—Should You You Jump In? - TipRanks
feed.summary: SoundHound AI (SOUN) has seen significant stock gains, rising over 13% in five trading days and more than 150% in six months, driven by AI hype and strong revenue growth. The company specializes in voice recognition and natural language processing, recently acquiring Interactions for $60 million to strengthen its position in Agentic AI. While analysts acknowledge the long-term potential, the stock’s rapid rise has pushed it above some price targets, suggesting limited short-term upside, despite the "Moderate Buy" consensus rating.

feed.title: SOUNDHOUND ALERT: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is Investigating SoundHound AI, Inc. on Behalf of Long-Term Stockholders and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
feed.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is investigating SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOUN) for potential breaches of fiduciary duties to long-term stockholders. This investigation follows a class action complaint filed in March 2025, which alleged that SoundHound failed to disclose material weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting, leading to an overstatement of goodwill and delayed financial filings. SoundHound's stock price dropped significantly after it disclosed its inability to timely file its 2024 Annual Report due to accounting complexities from recent acquisitions.

feed.title: SOUN Lawsuit Alert! Class Action Lawsuit Against SoundHound AI, Inc.
feed.summary: A class action lawsuit has been filed against SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) by shareholders who allege they bought SOUN stock at artificially inflated prices between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025. The lawsuit claims SoundHound AI made misleading statements regarding weaknesses in its internal controls over financial reporting and its ability to account for corporate acquisitions. Following revelations of these issues, SOUN stock experienced a significant decline, causing financial losses for investors.

feed.title: Investors who lost money on SoundHound AI, Inc.(SOUN) should contact The Gross Law Firm about pending Class Action - SOUN
feed.summary: The Gross Law Firm has issued a notice to shareholders of SoundHound AI, Inc. (NASDAQ: SOUN) regarding a pending class action lawsuit. Investors who purchased SOUN shares between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025, are encouraged to contact the firm. The complaint alleges that SoundHound made materially false or misleading statements concerning internal controls and the overstatement of goodwill.

feed.title: Investors Who Lost Money on SoundHound AI, Inc. (SOUN) Should Contact Levi & Korsinsky About Pending Class Action - SOUN
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky LLP is investigating a class action lawsuit against SoundHound AI, Inc. for alleged securities fraud between May 10, 2024, and March 3, 2025. The lawsuit claims the company made false statements and concealed material weaknesses in its internal controls, leading to inflated goodwill and potential inability to file financial reports timely. Investors who suffered losses during this period are encouraged to contact the firm for potential recovery.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Reports Record Third Quarter Revenue, Up 89%, Exceeding $25 Million; Raises Outlook
feed.summary: SoundHound AI reported record third-quarter revenue of $25.1 million, an 89% increase year-over-year, and exceeded expectations. The company also announced an increased revenue outlook for both 2024 and 2025, driven by significant diversification in customer base and expansion into new verticals like financial services, healthcare, and insurance. Keyvan Mohajer, CEO of SoundHound AI, highlighted the company's strong position in conversational AI, attributing success to strong technology, vertical integrations, and proprietary software.

feed.title: SoundHound AI enters at-the-market equity deal
feed.summary: SoundHound AI (NASDAQ: SOUN) has initiated an at-the-market (ATM) equity offering program to sell up to $120 million of its Class A common stock, with Barclays Capital Inc., Piper Sandler & Co., D.A. Davidson & Co., H.C. Wainwright & Co., LLC, and Joseph Gunnar & Co., LLC acting as sales managers. This move aims to bolster the company's capital structure and support further investment in its business operations, especially as it experiences significant revenue growth and expanding its conversational AI presence. Despite strong growth, the company is not yet profitable, making this ATM program crucial for its financial flexibility and long-term expansion goals.

feed.title: SoundHound AI To Participate in Investor Events in September
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. announced its participation in two investor events in September: the H.C. Wainwright Annual Global Investment Conference on September 9 and the Piper Sandler Growth Frontiers Conference on September 11. CFO Nitesh Sharan will represent the company, which will also hold one-on-one investor meetings at both conferences. SoundHound AI is a global leader in voice artificial intelligence, providing conversational AI solutions across various industries.

feed.title: SoundHound acquires Amelia for $80M to expand its conversational voice AI solutions
feed.summary: SoundHound AI Inc. is acquiring Amelia US LLC for $80 million in cash and equity to enhance its conversational and voice AI solutions, particularly for commerce. This acquisition follows a trend towards multimodal AI and will enable SoundHound to broaden its voice-enabled transaction capabilities into sectors like healthcare and financial services. The deal also involves SoundHound assuming Amelia's debt, with the combined company holding approximately $160 million in cash and $39 million in debt post-closing.

feed.title: SoundHound Chat AI Launches in Peugeot, Opel, and Vauxhall Vehicles Throughout Europe
feed.summary: SoundHound AI announced that its SoundHound Chat AI voice assistant, with integrated ChatGPT capabilities, is now live in Peugeot, Opel, and Vauxhall vehicles across 11 European markets. This expansion follows its successful launch with Stellantis’ DS Automobiles in March 2024. The technology offers hands-free control for navigation, calls, real-time information, and interactive knowledge discovery, enhancing the in-car experience for drivers and passengers.

feed.title: SoundHound AI Spotlights Voice AI Innovation at 2024 Viva Technology Conference
feed.summary: SoundHound AI will showcase its voice AI solutions, including Dynamic Drive Thru and SoundHound Chat AI Automotive, at the 2024 Viva Technology conference in Paris. The company will demonstrate its advanced AI-driven voice technology for restaurant ordering and in-vehicle experiences, including the global debut of Vehicle Intelligence. Pedram Faghfouri, Senior Director of Product, Automotive & IoT for SoundHound AI, will also speak about the company's voice AI use cases.

feed.title: SoundHound AI and Perplexity announced partnership
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, a leader in voice artificial intelligence, has partnered with Perplexity, an AI-powered answer engine, to integrate Perplexity's online LLM capabilities into SoundHound Chat AI. This collaboration aims to enhance the voice assistant's ability to provide accurate and real-time responses to web-based queries, offering more comprehensive and contextual information to users. The integration is expected to significantly improve the user experience by allowing for more complex inquiries and seamless integration with other device features like navigation.

feed.title: SoundHound AI: Sniffing Out A Bubble (NASDAQ:SOUN)
feed.summary: This article expresses skepticism about SoundHound AI's stock valuation, deeming it a potential bubble fueled by AI hype and Nvidia's involvement. While acknowledging the company's growth in voice solutions, the author questions its long-term competitive positioning due to rapidly advancing AI capabilities and believes the current valuation is unsustainable given future growth expectations.

feed.title: SoundHound AI To Participate in Citizens JMP Technology Conference on March 4
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, a leader in voice artificial intelligence, announced its participation in the Citizens JMP Technology Conference on March 4 in San Francisco. Nitesh Sharan, CFO of SoundHound AI, will present at 11:30 am PT/2:30 pm ET, with the presentation available to view live online. The company, known for its conversational intelligence solutions, will provide more information on its investor relations website.

feed.title: Launch of SoundHound Dynamic Interaction Marks Groundbreaking New Era For Human-Computer Interaction
feed.summary: SoundHound AI, Inc. introduced Dynamic Interaction™, a conversational AI breakthrough that allows for more natural human-computer interaction by processing speech in real-time without awkward pauses. This technology enables users to communicate as they would with a human, instantly customize requests, and receive multimodal feedback, making it particularly relevant for customer service and restaurant industries facing staffing challenges. SoundHound's Co-Founder and CEO, Keyvan Mohajer, emphasizes this as a significant technical leap forward, comparable to Apple's multi-touch technology, promising to revolutionize user experience.

feed.title: SoundHound and HARMAN join forces to deliver an effortless conversational voice AI experience to auto customers
feed.summary: SoundHound AI and HARMAN International are collaborating to bring a seamless and natural voice AI experience to the automotive market. SoundHound's advanced speech recognition software will be integrated into the HARMAN Ignite Store, allowing drivers and passengers to effortlessly interact with in-vehicle apps and devices. This partnership aims to provide automakers with a high-quality, next-generation system that minimizes distractions and maximizes convenience through conversational AI.

feed.title: Houndify Powers Hyundai’s Voice Recognition System in All-New Elantra and Elantra Hybrid Models in North America
feed.summary: SoundHound Inc. announced that its Houndify Voice AI platform will power Hyundai's Dynamic Voice Recognition system in the all-new 2021 Elantra and Elantra Hybrid models in North America. This marks the first time Hyundai's voice recognition system is launching in the American market, providing drivers with hands-free access to cloud-based information and enhancing the in-car experience with natural language capabilities. The integration in high-volume Elantra models signifies the growing adoption of voice AI in everyday vehicles.

feed.title: SoundHound Signs 7-Year Agreement with Hyundai and Reports Q1 Earnings with $230 Million in Cumulative Bookings
feed.summary: SoundHound announced a 7-year deal with Hyundai to integrate its Edge+Cloud voice AI technology, music recognition, and voice commerce solution into various vehicle models globally. This agreement, coinciding with SoundHound's Q1 earnings report boasting $230 million in cumulative bookings, expands their existing partnership to enhance in-car voice experiences across Genesis, Hyundai, and Kia vehicles in multiple languages. The collaboration will also explore voice commerce opportunities such as food ordering and voice payment for Hyundai customers.
